entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving no mail since the start of term and being surprised to see Hedwig.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is described as a snowy-white owl that landed in front of Harry carrying a large package.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as receiving an identical package to Harry's.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is described as Ron's minuscule and exhausted owl that was crushed by the package.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as Harry's only regular correspondent who is now dead.
